member.name: MSG
member.summary: Contains message information from a thread's message queue.

member.name: MSG.hwnd
member.summary: A handle to the window whose window procedure receives the message. This member is NULL when the message is a thread message.

member.name: MSG.message
member.summary: The message identifier. Applications can only use the low word; the high word is reserved by the system.

member.name: MSG.wParam
member.summary: Additional information about the message. The exact meaning depends on the value of themessage member.

member.name: MSG.lParam
member.summary: Additional information about the message. The exact meaning depends on the value of themessage member.

member.name: MSG.time
member.summary: The time at which the message was posted.

member.name: MSG.pt
member.summary: The cursor position, in screen coordinates, when the message was posted.
